entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to communicate with someone.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who has arrived at the Ministry and is trying to sort out a problem.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who yells 'OWLS!' in response to something.

entities.name: aunt
entities.description: Harry's aunt, whose house Harry is supposed to stay at.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: A place where Dumbledore has arrived and is trying to sort out a problem.

entities.name: owl
entities.description: An animal that delivers messages, tied with a roll of parchment to its leg.

relationships.description: Harry receives a message from Dumbledore, who is trying to sort out a problem at the Ministry.
Harry is supposed to stay at his aunt's house, according to Dumbledore's message.
